price: Será que tomou Ele filhas, para Si, dentre o que criou, e escolheu, para vós, os filhos?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ بَنَاتٖ وَأَصۡفَىٰكُم بِٱلۡبَنِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadha mimmā yakhluqu banātin wa-aṣfākum bil-banīna
